title.rendered: Wireless Headphones, Wireless Earbuds [Super Light] Bluetooth 5.0 Headphones with Type-C Charging Case, Wireless…

content.rendered:
MOTAST I07 – TRUE WIRELESS EXPERIENCE, THE ONE YOU HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR!

Q: If the left and proper earphones can’t be paired, please reset the earphones to manufacturing facility settings. How to Reset?

A:

1. Delete all Bluetooth gadget title of “i07” in your bluetooth checklist. Turn off Bluetooth in your cellphone.

2.Hold the Control Buttons of two earbuds for 6s in the meantime to initialize the 2 earphones.

3.The put 2 earbuds again into charging case to make sure 2 earbuds have energy.

4.Take out 2 earbuds, each earbuds flash blue mild on the identical time. When the 2 earbuds now not flicker on the identical time, the blue mild retains on, indicating that the earbuds are paired efficiently.

5. After that you may activate our bluetooth of the cell phone and refresh the bluetooth web page and seek for “i07”.

Note: Both left and proper earbuds can be utilized individually. Just take out one of many earbuds from the charging case.

The wi-fi earbuds are good reward for males or ladies!

What You Get
  • 2 x I07 Bluetooth headphones
  • 1 x Portable Magnetic Charging Case
  • 1 x Type-C Quick Charging Cable
  • 3 pairs of earplugs (S/M/L)
  • 1 x User Manual
Type-C Quick Charging Case

The USB Type-C charging connector gives quick charging velocity of as much as 10Gbps (solely 0.5hr), offering a extra secure and safer option to cost, will increase Bluetooth earbuds’ battery life dramatically.

Fast Automatic Pairing Technology

First time use – Take out I07 from the the charging case, then join through cellphone’s bluetooth menu.

Second time use – Just take out I07 from the charging case, then I07 will join with your cell phone mechanically.

Specification

  • Bluetooth 5.0 + EDR
  • 15m quick and secure Bluetooth connection
  • Battery LED show
  • 30hrs Playtime & 0.5hr charging time
  • Mini ergonomic design
  • 3.5g headphone weight
  • Compatible with iPhone, iPad, Android, Huawei, Samsung, Mac, Xiaomi, Sony and all gadgets with Bluetooth connection.

Read more

Hi-Fi Stereo Sound

Built in newest Bluetooth 5.0 chip and lossless HD rendering expertise, which permits it to be paired with numerous gadgets with out the music struggling any cut-off or latency. Just be at liberty to get pleasure from top quality wi-fi music and clear stereo calls.

IP7 Waterproof and Sweatproof

Sports wi-fi headphones are made of top quality, waterproof supplies, you now not have to fret about harm attributable to sweat or water. Perfect for operating, jogging, mountaineering, yoga, train, fitness center, driving, journey and and so on.

Super Lightweight and Comfortable Fit

With a Ultra-light weight of three.5g and ergonomic design, I07 wi-fi earbuds can suit your ears completely. You by no means want to fret about them falling off simply throughout train, no ache even in case you use it for a very long time.

Read more

Multi-function Touch Control

The wi-fi headphones use a contact management expertise with excessive sensitivity contact sensor, no strain throughout contact management of music Play / Pause, Answer name / Hang Up, Volume +/-, Next Song / Previous Song, Siri allow.

Portable Mini Charging Case

I07 Upgraded mini charging case has been designed to simply match into nearly any pocket or bag, it could recharge the bluetooth earbuds 5-6 instances. You’ll have sufficient energy for having fun with in sport and travelling.

Multiple Modes

  • Mono Mode: You can use one earbud or join with two totally different gadgets for calls or music.
  • Sharing Mode: You can share music, share films with your loved ones and pals.

Read more

Read more

Hi-Fi Stereo Sound and CVC8.0 Noise Reduction: Motast wi-fi earbuds undertake probably the most superior bluetooth 5.0 expertise, 2x sooner transmission velocity than the outdated Bluetooth V4.2 wi-fi earbuds, getting extra secure connectivity with out sign loss or music dropouts. Built in CVC8.0 noise discount design and top quality microphone, which may allow you to get pleasure from excessive constancy music high quality and clear calls sound anytime anyplace. IP7 Waterproof and and Smart Touch Control: The sports activities wi-fi earphones are made of top quality waterproof supplies, you now not have to fret about sweat or water. Ideal for the Running, Exercising in Gym and Outdoor actions.
Portable Type-C Charging Case: Bluetooth wi-fi earbuds can get greater than 6hrs steady battery life per cost. The charging case can recharge the earbuds 5-6 instances. With Type-C tech, it solely takes 1hr each full cost for the case. Ideal for on a regular basis life and extraordinary days. Take it with you when you commute, exercise and journey throughout the nation – even around the globe.
True Wireless and Comfortable Experience: You won’t ever fear about cable tangles whereas utilizing true wi-fi earbuds, each L-earbud and R-earbud can be utilized alone for calls and music in mono mode, you’ll be able to change freely between twin mode and mono mode. Fast Automatic Pairing Technology: You don’t need any skills to use Motast I07 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Headphones. Make your lifestyle cool with Motast wireless earbuds headphones.
